Introduction
This topic contains information on NPRC, including
National Archives and Records Administration (NARA)
types of records NPRC houses
determining the date a former service member’s service ended
STRs NPRC houses
personnel records NPRC houses
how records are filed at NPRC
NPRC’s Records Reconstruction Unit
proactive digitization of service records
using the PIES to request service records
, and
negative responses from NPRC
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - General Information on Service Records
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
